## PrimitiveOption type

Primitive 通用构造参数 剔除 appearance，depthFailAppearance，geometryInstances 属性

**Signature:**

```typescript

  NonNullable<ConstructorParameters<typeof Primitive>[0]>,
  'appearance' | 'depthFailAppearance' | 'geometryInstances'
>
```
